name: GetLandingPageFolders
description:
Retrieve the list of landing page folders from HubSpot CMS.

This tool fetches the list of landing page folders in HubSpot CMS, supporting paging and filtering. Useful for integrations needing to analyze these models or suggest edits via external services.

parameters.name: filter_folders_created_at
parameters.description: Return folders created at an exact specified time. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Return folders created after this specified ISO 8601 timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created after the specified time.

parameters.name: created_before_time
parameters.description: Return folders created before this specific time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created before the specified time.

parameters.name: exact_update_time
parameters.description: Return folders last updated at exactly the specified time. Use a string format for the timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_after_date
parameters.description: Only return folders last updated after the specified time. Use ISO 8601 format for the date and time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Return folders last updated before this specified timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_criteria
parameters.description: Fields to use for sorting results. Valid options: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Default: `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: next_page_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor token to retrieve the next set of results from a paged response.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: max_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of folder results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: folder_property
parameters.description: Specify properties to include in the response for each folder. Leave empty for all properties.

parameters.name: include_deleted_folders
parameters.description: Include deleted folders in the results when set to true. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Folders created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Folders created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Folders created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders created before the specified time.

parameters.description: Only return Folders last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Folders last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Folders last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Folders last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
